content.question: Using the substitution <math alttext="u equals, x minus 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="the integral from 2 to 10, of, 3 x times the square root of x minus 1, end root, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> is equivalent to

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from 1 to 9 of, 3 times, open parenthesis, u plus 1, close parenthesis, times the square root of u, end root, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from 1 to 9, of, 3 u times open parenthesis, u plus 1, close parenthesis, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>u</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from 2 to 10, of, open parenthesis, 3 u plus 1, close parenthesis, times the square root of u, end root, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the integral from 2 to 10 of, 3 u times, the square root of u plus 1, end root, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>10</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>u</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from 1 to 9 of, 3 times, open parenthesis, u plus 1, close parenthesis, times the square root of u, end root, d u" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>3</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>u</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>u</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math>
